title: What does the LF and TF mean in Fontshop FF Bau fonts
content: I came across FF Bau and wanted to know what the difference was between Bau LF, Bau TF, Bau Reg because I could not see a difference among them.
author: Capnhud

comments.content:
LF - Lining Figures (generelly used with capital letters)  
TF - Tabular Figures (Fixed width numerals)
thanks for the link Steve! I knew some of that but that article was very helpful!

Thanks for the article that has cleared up everything.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
